channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024041555
item.description:
Report X-2024041555

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-06T15:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-15
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: April 15 2024 UTLX 645116 was found leaking in BNSF Globville CO yard. car was isolated for repair and inspection. No ground impacts observed and spill material impacted the car body only. BNSF contractor responders inspected the car and found the manway gasket defective, removed and replaced the gasket and removed impacts from the car for appropriate disposal. Car was released for service.
